title: Rick and Morty: Virtual Rick-ality Download
description:
Rick and Morty: Virtual Rick-ality Download PC Game In Direct Link for free on SteamRIP
Rick and Morty have teleported into your living room for a cutting-edge VR adventure from Adult Swim Games and Owlchemy Labs (Job Simulator). Play as a Morty clone as you explore Rick’s garage, the Smith household, and alien worlds. The Good Life
Experience life as a clone of Morty and all the trauma that comes with it. Step through portals to strange worlds, help Rick with his bizarre experiments, and use your hands in VR to pick up and play in an interaction-filled 3D Rick-ality. Follow Rick’s directions (or don’t!) to solve puzzles and complete missions in this fully voice acted adventure.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater
system_requirements.Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480
